law.text: A television or radio broadcasting station or a publisher or printer of a newspaper, magazine, or other form of printed advertising that broadcasts, publishes, or prints a charitable solicitation that violates this title is not liable for the violation, unless the station, publisher, or printer has knowledge that the charitable solicitation violates this title.
